thread.section_title: Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Business Hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent Business Hotel - Review of Renaissance Paris La Defense Hotel, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jane M
title: Excellent Business Hotel
text: Stayed in this hotel for a business trip. Excellent hotel! Rooms and facilities are a very high standard, business lounge is very good, staff see customer service as a top priority, excellent service. The room service is also very good, in fact best I have had when travelling on business. Thanks for an excellent stay!
